Atari and Bandai Namco announce the Atari 2600+ Pac-Man Edition!

Atari has announced a limited edition of its Atari 2600+ console to celebrate PAC-MAN's 45th anniversary. The bright yellow console launches alongside limited edition CX-40+ wireless joysticks modeled after PAC-MAN and the Ghost Gang and a collection of four games.
